divs: Sighting Detailsi was at a friends house for the 4th of July we were all outside lighting fireworks when we notice these 5 lights in the sky the lights were bright and the way they were in the sky it was hard not to notice them then they slowly moving to the left then slowly went away we were all a little lost to what it could be we knew it was not a plane or helicopter the 5 lights disappeared but 2 of the lights came back that's when i stated taking video and picture when it came back and just hovered again we knew it had to be UFOs it started as 5 bright lights some would get brighter or start moving they were moving to the left slowly just glad me and my friends all saw it together it was easy to talk with all of them about what happened they just slowly disappeared
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rosemead
There were no other sightings in Rosemead on or around July 4th 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
